description:
Create and send emails from a custom domain directly from gmail thanks to Cloudflare Email routing.

Checkout my other Cloudflare for Dev videos: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLEsfXFp6DpzQqG-DIxPrKPQT9bsUFdP0U&si=sOiiNIaWqxTSsS7H

Blog post I found useful: https://0x4f.medium.com/use-your-own-domain-name-with-gmail-at-no-cost-with-cloudflare-cf8bf47a8d02

00:00:00 Welcome
00:00:49 Unlimited Custom Domain Email Addresses
00:01:39 Add Your Domain to Cloudflare
00:05:37 Email Routing Domain Records
00:08:59 Verify Incoming Email for a Custom Domain
00:12:53 Send Emails from Custom Domain in Gmail
00:22:25 Thank you and next steps
title: Free Unlimited Custom Domain Email Addresses with Gmail and Cloudflare.
